statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_date = '2022-07-15'
SELECT customer_id, product_name, sales_date FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_representative = 'John Doe' ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sales_representative FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_representative = 'John Doe' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, sales_amount DESC
SELECT sales_representative, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data GROUP BY sales_representative ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE customer_id = 123 AND sales_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_date DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT sales_id, sales_date, sales_representative FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%Pain%' ORDER BY sales_date ASC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_date, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_quantity >= 50 AND sales_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM market_analysis WHERE market_segment = 'Hospital' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, product_name LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;

SELECT psd.product_name, ma.market_segment, ma.market_trend FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data psd JOIN market_analysis ma ON psd.sales_id = ma.sales_id WHERE ma.market_segment = 'Retail' ORDER BY psd.product_name ASC;

SELECT psd.product_name, SUM(psd.sales_quantity) AS total_sales_quantity FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data psd JOIN market_analysis ma ON psd.sales_id = ma.sales_id GROUP BY psd.product_name HAVING total_sales_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_sales_quantity DESC;
SELECT MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales_amount, MIN(sales_amount) AS min_sales_amount, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales_data;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM pharmaceutical_sales;
SELECT rep_name, territory, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT product_name, sales_date, quantity_sold FROM pharmaceutical_sales ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT rep_name, sales_amount, territory FROM sales_representatives, sales_performance WHERE sales_representatives.rep_id = sales_performance.rep_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales ORDER BY sales_date DESC, quantity_sold ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sales_date, quantity_sold FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sales_date ASC;

SELECT sp.product_id, pr.product_name, sr.rep_name, sp.sales_amount FROM sales_performance sp JOIN pharmaceutical_sales pr ON sp.product_id = pr.product_id JOIN sales_representatives sr ON sp.rep_id = sr.rep_id WHERE sp.sales_amount > 50000 ORDER BY sp.sales_amount DESC;

SELECT pr.product_name, sp.sales_amount, sr.territory FROM sales_performance sp JOIN pharmaceutical_sales pr ON sp.product_id = pr.product_id JOIN sales_representatives sr ON sp.rep_id = sr.rep_id WHERE sr.territory = 'East';

SELECT pr.product_name, SUM(sp.sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_performance sp JOIN pharmaceutical_sales pr ON sp.product_id = pr.product_id GROUP BY pr.product_name HAVING total_sales > 100000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, price FROM drugs WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sale_id, pharmacy_id, drug_id, sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT drug_name, price FROM drugs WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, drug_name, quantity FROM pharmacies p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.pharmacy_id = s.pharmacy_id ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT pharmacy_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM pharmacies p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.pharmacy_id = s.pharmacy_id GROUP BY pharmacy_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT rep_name, territory FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives WHERE territory = 'East Coast'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%'
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
